creditline: Gift of David Tausig Frank and Kazukuni Sugiyama
image_copyright: © Minol Araki, licensed by David Frank and Kazukuni Sugiyama
medium: Ink and color on paper, wood
text: A page of an album showing an ink sketch of five bearded, long-armed shrimp, four of which are clustered into criss-crosses while the fifth shrimp is outside of the group. Each shrimp is painted in black ink and gray inkwash. The black ink marks the jagged head of the shrimp, while the ink wash forms the body and tail, accented with a darker inkwash to highlight the segmented abdomen.
title: Album of Sketches of Fish and Shellfish
